data.title: 键入缺少的字母，完成下面的文字
data.blankContent: It's unrealistic to think every course is capable of being offered through the global classroom, due to factors ranging from language barriers to the requirements of the courses. Courses ____ the ____ arts ____ be ____ taught ____ with ____. The ____ challenge ____ come ____ the ____ sciences, i.e. physics, chemistry and biology.
data.partBlankContent: It's unrealistic to think every course is capable of being offered through the global classroom, due to factors ranging from language barriers to the requirements of the courses. Courses i_ the lib____ arts c__ be eas___ taught al___ with ma__. The big____ challenge wi__ come fr__ the phys____ sciences, i.e. physics, chemistry and biology.
data.fullContent: It's unrealistic to think every course is capable of being offered through the global classroom, due to factors ranging from language barriers to the requirements of the courses. Courses in the liberal arts can be easily taught along with math. The biggest challenge will come from the physical sciences, i.e. physics, chemistry and biology.
data.answer: 由于语言障碍和课程要求等因素，认为每一门课程都能通过全球课堂提供是不现实的。文科课程可以很容易地和数学一起教授。最大的挑战将来自物理科学，即物理、化学和生物。
